recipes.name: Guacamole (Vegan)
recipes.instructions: Mash avocado, mix with chopped vegetables and lime juice.

recipes.name: Huevos Rancheros (Non-Veg)
recipes.instructions: Cook eggs, place on tortillas with beans and salsa.

recipes.name: Veggie Tacos (Vegan)
recipes.instructions: Cook vegetables with spices, fill tortillas, serve.

recipes.name: Chicken Quesadilla (Non-Veg)
recipes.instructions: Cook chicken and vegetables, layer with cheese in tortilla, cook on skillet.

recipes.name: Beef Burrito (Non-Veg)
recipes.instructions: Cook beef, assemble burrito with rice, beans, and cheese.

recipes.name: Veggie Enchiladas (Veg)
recipes.instructions: Roll vegetables in tortillas, top with sauce and cheese, bake.

recipes.name: Nachos (Veg)
recipes.instructions: Layer chips with toppings and bake until cheese melts.

recipes.name: Churros (Veg)
recipes.instructions: Prepare dough, fry in oil, roll in cinnamon sugar.
